ing: 1 (12 ounce) jar hot yellow peppers with brine
des: "These simple to make pickled eggs are a great snack along with pretzels. For hotter eggs pierce the yellow chili peppers with a sharp knife and/or add other hot peppers."
ins: Stir peppers and brine, water, vinegar, pickling spice, sugar, salt, and turmeric together in a 1/2 gallon mason jar or container. Add eggs to pepper mixture and seal container. Refrigerate for at least 2 days.
